498230.name: Red vs. Blue: The Blood Gulch Chronicles (Volume 2)
498230.description: When a mild-mannered medical officer finds himself deployed to the most worthless stretch of land in the entire galaxy, the last things he expects to find are his patients dead, a poltergeist haunting a robot, a 200-ton tank in the center of a love triangle, and an evil strain of artificial intelligence attempting to enslave all of humanity. Welcome to Blood Gulch.

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
